summary: The video features Jordan Bardella delivering a speech at a podium, addressing the audience with a message of unity and victory. He discusses the political situation in France, mentioning the National Rally party's significant achievement and criticizes the alliance between Emmanuel Macron and Gabriel Attal with the far-left. Bardella expresses his commitment to leading the country forward with the support of the people. The scene includes a crowd of people taking photos and clips, indicating a public event. The date 'VINCENNES, 7 JUILLET 2024' is displayed on the podium.
keywords: Jordan Bardella, National Rally, France, election, victory, speech, politics, alliance, Emmanuel Macron, Gabriel Attal, far-left, European elections, first round, political leaning, crowd, podium, Vincennes, July 7, 2024
